video.title: TEDTalks: Smart Laughs
video.synopsis: Watch these folks deliver their bright ideas with wit, wisecracks and whoot! The talented performers riff on race, religion, art, society and more.

episodes.synopsis: Performer and Web toymaker Ze Frank delivers a hilarious standup routine, then tells us what he's seriously passionate about.
episodes.title: Ze Frank's Nerdcore Comedy

episodes.synopsis: Poet Rives does lyrical origami, folding history into a series of coincidences surrounding 4 o'clock in the morning.
episodes.title: Rives on 4 a.m.

episodes.synopsis: Ze Frank presents zany Internet toys that require deep participation -- and reward it with something more nourishing.
episodes.title: Ze Frank's Web Playroom

episodes.synopsis: A founding member of the Axis of Evil Comedy Tour riffs on the challenges and conflicts of being Iranian-American.
episodes.title: Maz Jobrani: Did You Hear the One About the Iranian-American?

episodes.synopsis: When two Mormon missionaries knock on Julia Sweeney's door one day, it touches off a quest to rethink her own beliefs.
episodes.title: Julia Sweeney on Letting Go of God

episodes.synopsis: Nature's mysteries meet tack-sharp wit as comedian and TV man John Lloyd plucks at the substance of several things not seen.
episodes.title: John Lloyd Inventories the Invisible

episodes.synopsis: The Scottish funnyman convenes a historic council as he lampoons Gordon Brown, Barack Obama and other world leaders.
episodes.title: Rory Bremner's One-Man World Summit

episodes.synopsis: Charlie Todd and his group, Improv Everywhere, causes bizarre, hilarious and unexpected public scenes.
episodes.title: Charlie Todd: The Shared Experience of Absurdity

episodes.synopsis: Comedian Charles Fleischer delivers a hysterical send-up of a time-honored TED theme: the map.
episodes.title: Charles Fleischer Insists: All Things Are Moleeds

episodes.synopsis: In a tongue-in-cheek analysis, a statistician comes up with a metric for creating "the optimum TEDTalk."
episodes.title: Lies, Damned Lies and Statistics (About TED Talks)

episodes.synopsis: McKay sings "Mother of Pearl" (with the immortal first line "Feminists don't have a sense of humor") and "If I Had You."
episodes.title: Nellie McKay Sings Mother of Pearl and If I Had You

episodes.synopsis: A philosopher-comedian talks (hilariously) about science, math, society and the way everything connects.
episodes.title: Emily Levine's Theory of Everything

episodes.synopsis: Ursus Wehrli creates tidier art by deconstructing the paintings of masters into component pieces, sorted by color and size.
episodes.title: Ursus Wehrli Tidies Up Art

episodes.synopsis: New Yorker cartoonist Liza Donnelly shares a portfolio of her wise and funny cartoons about modern life.
episodes.title: Liza Donnelly: Drawing Upon Humor for Change

episodes.synopsis: Sebastian Wernicke thinks every TEDTalk can be summarized in six words. In this talk, he shows how to do just that -- and less. Filmed at TEDxZurich.
episodes.title: Sebastian Wernicke: 1000 TEDTalks, 6 Words

episodes.synopsis: Onstage at TEDxRainier, writer Chris Bliss shares his thoughts on the ways that great comedy can translate deep truths for a mass audience.
episodes.title: Chris Bliss: Comedy Is Translation

episodes.synopsis: Author Rob Reid offers a comic look at Copyright Math (TM), the amazing numbers behind the entertainment industry's fight against online piracy.
episodes.title: Rob Reid: The $8 Billion iPod

episodes.synopsis: In this short TED2012 talk, book designer Chip Kidd uses his wicked sense of humor to explain the art and deep thought of his cover designs.
episodes.title: Chip Kidd: Designing Books Is No Laughing Matter. OK, It Is

episodes.synopsis: Reggie Watts' beats defy boxes. Unplug your logic board and watch as he blends poetry and crosses musical genres in this larger-than-life performance.
episodes.title: Reggie Watts Disorients You in the Most Entertaining Way

episodes.synopsis: In this enlightening and funny short TED2012 talk, conservation advocate Joe Smith reveals the trick to efficient bathroom paper towel use.
episodes.title: Joe Smith: How to Use a Paper Towel
